Reviews.Title: Samsung Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: BB "VP"
Reviews.Content: This was truly a value purchase.  A gift for a college student who loves working with this camera for class work.  The pictures are stunning, especially the panoramic views.

Reviews.Title: Best camera i've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Zack m
Reviews.Content: If you are looking to get great pictures but not pay a lot, this camera is for you. Ive been using a point and shoot compact camera for years.. thinking it was just as good.. but i was wrong. This camera beats the point and shoot 10 fold. at a great price, this product offers 16mp even when zoomed.. I was surprised when i took a picture fully zoomed in and actually Captured the snow flakes during a snow storm! Best camera without breaking the bank!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Omar Mahmud
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a win-win. I am starting up my own clothing line and I needed this camera to take pictures of the models and the products and this camera takes amazing quality pictures and all the features on it, make it 10x better.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Judy S.
Reviews.Content: Great product, clear photos,many added features. Advise reading the manual to know what all the icons represent. Comes with everything you need to start taking photos as soon as it arrives

Reviews.Title: NICE!!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Schaub "dws57"
Reviews.Content: AA batteries and a big memory card. Perfect! Forget those micro card & special battery losers, you'll be happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Flotashia Nichole Gentry
Reviews.Content: This Camera is Great!!!  I consider myself an amateur Photographer, so I'm quite thrilled to have this new Camera in my life!!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Abstract
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box it was easy to use.  The automatic setting adjusts the lighting perfectly!  And hooking up to a computer was a breeze, no software needed.  Plug n play just like a flash drive. Pictures are a great quality.

Reviews.Title: Zoom lever broke in 2 months
Reviews.Author: Kevin R Robinson
Reviews.Content: I had several issues with this camera. The screen is hard to see in the daylight Some colors were not rendered accurately. It claims 26X Zoom, but seems considerably less, more like maybe 18X. The Zoom lever broke after 2 months, with fewer than a dozen uses. I couldn't get the Samsung USA website to work when trying to register this item. One Star!

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera
Reviews.Author: Loyd Massey
Reviews.Content: This camera has more pixels, memory, and zoom than all of my previous cameras.My wife and I Love  This camera especially the anti vibration feature, its awesome !!!!!!!
